original_text: Every piece of ground that you walk on will belong to you. The borders of your land will go from the desert in the south as far as Lebanon in the north. They will go from the Euphrates river in the east to the Mediterranean Sea in the west.
korean_text: 너희의 발바닥으로 밟는 곳은 다 너희의 소유가 되리니 너희의 경계는 곧 광야에서부터 레바논까지와 유브라데 강에서부터 서해까지라

sentences.original_text: Every piece of ground that you walk on
The borders of your land will go
from the desert in the south
as far as Lebanon in the north
They will go from the Euphrates river in the east
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 동쪽의 유브라데 강부터 이를 것이다

sentences.original_text: to the Mediterranean Sea in the west
